name: example_tbnn
description: Example TBNN model for anisotropy prediction (2D)

architecture.notes: Based on Ling et al. (2016) architecture, reduced for 2D

features.description: 5 invariants from normalized strain and rotation tensors

reference.title: Reynolds averaged turbulence modelling using deep neural networks with embedded invariance
reference.authors: Ling, J., Kurzawski, A., & Templeton, J.
reference.notes: This is an example/dummy model inspired by but not identical to the paper

training.notes: Generated with random weights for testing - NOT the actual Ling model

usage.notes: This is a demonstration model with random weights, not trained weights

next_steps: Or train model using DNS data
